story:
Hello Sci-Fi Photography Fans

My name is Michael Love and I have been a photographer  / Indie artist for over 25 years, and I have always wanted to publish a calendar featuring my art.

This fine art calendar has energized my creative. Inspired by some of the most popular films ever made and now it is ready for you to enjoy.

Each calendar is 11x17 in size and is wire bound at the top  There are the 12 months from January to December 2017 plus as a bonus the cover acts as a extra month of January 2018  The paper used in making each calendar is like card stock, the high resolution and colours are full and rich. So much work has been put into each picture creating something very unique and memorable  . 

This is perfect gift for the mature sci-fi fan who has everything. *This is not for children!

This is my first attempt to crowdfunding and I am very excited to see where this goes. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Please pick one of these perk packages.

  • $10.00  for a colour, glossy 11x14 collage print. Featuring 20 models posing for my Sexy Fan Photography project.  
  • $35.00 for one 11x17  wire bound calendar.  There are the 12 months from January to December 2017 plus as a bonus the cover acts as a extra month of January 2018. The paper used in making each calendar is like card stock, the high resolution and colours are full and rich.
  • $75.00 / Combination Package - You will receive  two 11x17 wire bound calendars and a 11x14 collage print.  

As soon as this project is funded the files will go to the printer. Due to the short finding timeline you will have your calendars as soon as possible.

Below is what the 11x14 collage print looks like:

 

The Impact

Star Wars 1977 , the original movie has had a profound influence on me as a child and even now as a man. My creative mind was ignited thanks to this ground braking film. Sure I had the action figures, the posters, the comic books even the record just like so many other fans. Phrases like ‘evil empire’ and ‘May the Force be with you’ have become popular lexicon. The characters and their themes that revolved around myths and legends are universal. It’s because of this one film I became a filmmaker and photographer. Star Wars helped me to open my mind, to create, to think the impossible was possible.  

I have taken on a substantial investment by curating these images. I use lots of props, jewelry and custom masks and costumes. All of this and the photo gear to shoot and edit has taken so much time to accumulate. There is no way I could ever recoup the money and time spent on this project. I did it because I was and still am inspired by this sci-fi universe. 

I have been blessed to of worked with so many different creative open-minded models and friends in creating this project. 

My main goal is to get my art that I have worked so hard on making into the hands of like minded individuals. What better way than a calendar. This project is for the fans, the cosplayers, the dreamers who enjoy the 'little rebel' that these films fuel.

I have had the oppertunity showcase my Sexy Fan Photography in different  Art Galleries and the reaction I received was so positive and full of excitement towards the satire I brought to this theme. Sexy Fan Photography is all about fun and creativity.

 

Risks & Challenges

No matter how well you plan, something always goes wrong. That's the nature of things when you are only one person working with printers and shipping projects. No matter what what situations may or may not arise I will do my best to resolve them as quickly as possible. 

Note: All all photos appearing on Indiegogo are not final and may be reprocessed, cropped, or re-edited to make sure I can get the best product when printing. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't pledge at this time, you can definitely still help by sharing this project on social media like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr, YouTube, ect  etc... 

Also, feel free to take a closer look on this project Sexy Fan Photography and other projects I have created

 http://www.mrlovephoto.com

or 

 http://www.modelmayhem.com/MrLovephoto

Here is a link to more videos on my photography... Please subscribe!!!!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7eC_Lv7VlEXycR0Bungf2Q

come join me and see more updates on this project on FaceBook

https://www.facebook.com/sexyfanphotography/

May the calendar be with you. Thank you for your support !!

-Michael Love
story_txt:
Hello Sci-Fi Photography Fans
My name is Michael Love and I have been a photographer  / Indie artist for over 25 years, and I have always wanted to publish a calendar featuring my art.
This fine art calendar has energized my creative. Inspired by some of the most popular films ever made and now it is ready for you to enjoy.
Each calendar is 11x17 in size and is wire bound at the top  There are the 12 months from January to December 2017 plus as a bonus the cover acts as a extra month of January 2018  The paper used in making each calendar is like card stock, the high resolution and colours are full and rich. So much work has been put into each picture creating something very unique and memorable  . 
This is perfect gift for the mature sci-fi fan who has everything. *This is not for children!
This is my first attempt to crowdfunding and I am very excited to see where this goes. 

 

What We Need & What You Get
Please pick one of these perk packages.


$10.00  for a colour, glossy 11x14 collage print. Featuring 20 models posing for my Sexy Fan Photography project.  

$35.00 for one 11x17  wire bound calendar.  There are the 12 months from January to December 2017 plus as a bonus the cover acts as a extra month of January 2018. The paper used in making each calendar is like card stock, the high resolution and colours are full and rich.

$75.00 / Combination Package - You will receive  two 11x17 wire bound calendars and a 11x14 collage print.  

As soon as this project is funded the files will go to the printer. Due to the short finding timeline you will have your calendars as soon as possible.
Below is what the 11x14 collage print looks like:

 

The Impact
Star Wars 1977 , the original movie has had a profound influence on me as a child and even now as a man. My creative mind was ignited thanks to this ground braking film. Sure I had the action figures, the posters, the comic books even the record just like so many other fans. Phrases like ‘evil empire’ and ‘May the Force be with you’ have become popular lexicon. The characters and their themes that revolved around myths and legends are universal. It’s because of this one film I became a filmmaker and photographer. Star Wars helped me to open my mind, to create, to think the impossible was possible.  
I have taken on a substantial investment by curating these images. I use lots of props, jewelry and custom masks and costumes. All of this and the photo gear to shoot and edit has taken so much time to accumulate. There is no way I could ever recoup the money and time spent on this project. I did it because I was and still am inspired by this sci-fi universe. 
I have been blessed to of worked with so many different creative open-minded models and friends in creating this project. 
My main goal is to get my art that I have worked so hard on making into the hands of like minded individuals. What better way than a calendar. This project is for the fans, the cosplayers, the dreamers who enjoy the 'little rebel' that these films fuel.
I have had the oppertunity showcase my Sexy Fan Photography in different  Art Galleries and the reaction I received was so positive and full of excitement towards the satire I brought to this theme. Sexy Fan Photography is all about fun and creativity.

 

Risks & Challenges
No matter how well you plan, something always goes wrong. That's the nature of things when you are only one person working with printers and shipping projects. No matter what what situations may or may not arise I will do my best to resolve them as quickly as possible. 
Note: All all photos appearing on Indiegogo are not final and may be reprocessed, cropped, or re-edited to make sure I can get the best product when printing. 


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't pledge at this time, you can definitely still help by sharing this project on social media like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr, YouTube, ect  etc... 
Also, feel free to take a closer look on this project Sexy Fan Photography and other projects I have created
 http://www.mrlovephoto.com
or 
 http://www.modelmayhem.com/MrLovephoto
Here is a link to more videos on my photography... Please subscribe!!!!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7eC_Lv7VlEXycR0Bungf2Q
come join me and see more updates on this project on FaceBook
https://www.facebook.com/sexyfanphotography/
May the calendar be with you. Thank you for your support !! 

-Michael Love

story:
Food Photography Business in Denver, CO

Some people eat to live. I live to eat. For me, food is more than sustenance. I love food and how healthy it can be for the mind, body, and soul. In fact, food is a passion second only to my desire to express the benefits of a healthy lifestyle. The camera is my way of doing just that. Instead of a picture worth a thousand words, I strive for images that balance health and hunger. If my imagery reminds people of their physical relationship with food, increases their passion for sustenance, and makes their mouths water, then my hunger is satisfied too.

Real, healthy, beautiful, delicious food: that is what I bring to the table.

Through professional quality, mouth watering photography, local food based businesses gain credibility, appeal, and branding inspiring their customers to crave their food and come back wanting more.  Starry Photography believes that real food is beautiful, which is why we only photograph 100% natural and edible food.

Katie Starry, owner and lead photographer, has a degree in Professional Photography from Colorado Mountain College.  She has an extensive portfolio of food images showcasing true, wholesome products both in the setting of a restaurant and in the studio.

In addition to photography, Katie is a Personal Trainer and Nutrition Coach.  She has a true passion to help people be the healthiest they can be.  This passion shines through in her photography and reveals that healthy food can be just as appetizing as the not so healthful alternative.


The reason for seeking funding is so that Katie can focus all of her time and energy on her photography business and take that leap to following this dream.  Starry Photography will change the face of food photography in the Denver area by photographing real food, focusing on small local food/beverage based businesses, and offering extreme customer service.



What We Need & What You Get

Starry Photography needs $5,000 in order to purchase some equipment and cover overhead costs for the first few months in order to build up a client base.

The perks you receive just might make you hungry!  They are as follows:

$5 - Thank you card!

$20 - Signed 8x10 food photo print.

$50 - Signed 8x10 food photo print as well as a Food photo refrigerator magnet.

$100 - Signed 8x10 food photo print, food photo refrigerator magnet, and a food photo mousepad.

$150 - Signed 8x10 food photo print, food photo refrigerator magnet, a food photo mousepad, and a signed 4x6 standout mounted print.

$300 - Signed 8x10 food photo print, food photo refrigerator magnet, and a food photo mousepad, a signed 4x6 standout mounted print and a set of 4 food photo coasters (Denver food/beverage based business get photo shoot and all prints of their food)

$500 - Signed 8x10 food photo print, food photo refrigerator magnet, and a food photo mousepad, a signed 4x6 standout mounted print, a set of 4 food photo coasters, and signed 2 8x10 standout mounted prints making a diptych image. (Denver food/beverage based business get photo shoot and all prints of their food)

$1000 - Signed 8x10 food photo print, food photo refrigerator magnet, and a food photo mousepad, a signed 4x6 standout mounted print, a set of 4 food photo coasters, signed 2 8x10 standout mounted prints making a diptych image and a coffee table style signed food photography book. (Denver food/beverage based business get photo shoot and all prints of their food)

$1100+  - Signed 8x10 food photo print, food photo refrigerator magnet, and a food photo mousepad, a signed 4x6 standout mounted print, a set of 4 food photo coasters, signed 2 8x10 standout mounted prints making a diptych image, a coffee table style signed food photography book and a 12x18 food photograph of your choice printed and framed. (Denver food/beverage based business get photo shoot and all prints of their food)


Use of funds:

Equipment & Rent: $5,000

Computer and software: $2,000

Wages: $1,600

Fees and other dues: $700

Marketing/Supplies: $500

Total: $10,000


The Impact

Food photography doesn't have to be what you see on a Burger King billboard.  You should see an image on a restaurants website or menu and when you order that item, it looks exactly like that picture.  Starry Photography strives for this truth and also the health that goes with that.  Instead of tricking people into purchasing a burger that will not nourish them, we should be enlightening them about how delicious healthy food can be and where they can find it in their communities.

Your contribution will help Starry Photography to change the way we think about food and how it is presented to us.  Katie has a passion for this beyond anything else and will not stop until she is successful.


Risks & Challenges

Starry Photography's biggest challenge is simply not being able to get enough clients.  By getting this funding it will allow Katie to spend more time talking with businesses and marketing the business.  However, nothing is guaranteed.  There is always the risk that a month will go by with no business.  This is part of any small business though so Starry Photography will keep pushing forward and serving the Denver area!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, I completely understand.  Please share this though either via Facebook or other medium because maybe you know someone who can!  If you know a food/beverage based business in the Denver area, I would also love it if you let them know about me and what I am doing.  They are my ideal client and I can't wait to work with them!

story:
UPD - JULY 2016: book is done (final title - By The Way), available for print-on-demand via Blurb, perks shipped, project noticed globally - featured on LensCulture 


MYCAMPAIGN / МОЯ КАМПАНИЯ

So my IndiGoGo campaign ended yesterday – cordial thanks to supporters, who shared info, and especially to ones who became backers and who invested in my project. Funds we gathered (though it is less than one fifth part of expected goal) will allow me to cover expenses of the book design-layout, to print limited series of book copies (as prototype and rewards), to deliver all perks to backers. We did a very important step! And results coming soon......

***

Итак, вчера завершилась моя кампания на IndieGoGo – сердечное спасибо всем поддержавшим, и тем, кто делился моей информацией, и, в особенности, тем, кто стал инвестором проекта, вложив свои деньги. Собранные средства (хотя это пятая часть ожидавшейся суммы) позволят покрыть расходы на дизайн и верстку книги, на печать ограниченного тиража книги (прототип и подарки инвесторам), на доставку всех вознаграждений инвесторам. Мы сделали важный шаг! Результаты – скоро…. 

-------------------------------------------------

ФОТОКНИГА "СИБИРЯКИ: ГЛУБИНКА"

There is surface and depth: political madness and daily life apart, hot news and eternal songs, otherness and kinship. When you are sharing simple human things with someone and feel the commonality behind the differences – there are more chances to understand than to fight...

***
Есть поверхность и есть глубина: политические безумства - и будни вдали от столиц, горячие новости - и вечные песни, отчужденность и родство. Если ты разделил с кем-то простое-человеческое, почувствовал то общее, что лежит за различиями - более вероятным становится  понимание, не схватка...

Milker Ivan with his nephew. Дояр Иван с племянником © Valeriy Klamm 

I’m Valeriy Klamm, photograher based in Novosibirsk, Russia. I invite you to dive into the reality of Siberia, to ‘meet’ my neighbours (thousands of miles away, but that's not so far, right?) ... It's cordiality and paradoxes of habitual moments, unpolished details of existence. It's a gallery of simple heroes in simple circumstances: women and men coming through ages, shaman and theater director, babushka and pilot, fostered girls and plumber - their fates beyond faces.  Open this door: my photo book ‘The Siberians’. 

***

Я Валерий Кламм, фотограф из Новосибирска. Приглашаю вас погрузиться в реальность Сибири, познакомиться с моими соседями (тысяча вёрст не крюк ?)) ... Сердечность и парадоксы обыденного, шершавые детали бытия. Простые герои в простых обстоятельствах: мужчины и женщины в их возрастах-времени, шаман и режиссер, бабушка и летчик, приемная дочка и водопроводчик - и судьбы, что стоят за лицами.  Откройте эту дверь: моя фотокнига ‘Сибиряки’. 

About / О проекте

Since late 2009 I’ve run the photoblog community ‘Birthmarks On the Map’ - BOM (in Russian – ‘Rodinki Na Karte’) - devoted to Russian provinces and focused on inhabitants of little towns and villages. This project, at first supported by local partners, now exists as my own independent initiative without resources. Yet it has also grown, having gone 'offline' with group and solo printed shows & multimedia presentations in my region and abroad (Australia, Cambodia, Sweden, Canada, China)... Besides my short intro video above - here is a longer one, a sort of trance ...

***

С конца 2009 года я веду коллективный фотоблог ‘Родинки на карте’ (РНК), посвященный российской провинции, жителям деревень и малых городов. Этот проект, на старте поддержанный местными партнерами, ныне существует как моя частная, независимая инициатива, без опоры на чьи-либо ресурсы. По мере роста и развития, Родинки вышли в оффлайн групповыми и сольными выставками, мультимедиа-показами, в моем регионе и вне России (Австралия, Камбоджа, Швеция, Канада, Китай)... Кроме моего короткого вводного видео - посмотрите вот это, подлиннее, некий транс ... ЗАГОВОР: "хор" фотографов-участников Родинок - и музыкантов 


WATCH  & MEDITATE  -  'INCANTATION' , 'Birthmarks On the Map' clip: 'CHORUS' OF PHOTOGRAPHERS-CONTRIBUTORS (Valeriy Klamm, Alexander Sorin, Ksenia Diodorova, Andrey Kobylko, Fyodor Telkov, Sergey Maximishin, Alexander Kuznetzov, Alexander Stepanenko, Alexander Kustov, Tatyana Plotnikova, Igor Lagunov, Emil Gataullin) AND MUSICIANS (track by Sergey Starostin, Sainkho Namchylak, Molla Silla, Arkadiy Shilkloper, Vladimir Volkov, Pavel Fait) 

I assembled my ‘The Siberians’ book: 1st dummy  in 2012, 2nd version self-published offset in 2013 in Novosibirsk (offset, Rus-Eng bi-lingual texts and captions, available also in pdf via Blurb.com and for in Print-On-Demand on Amazon - see pictures below). 

***

Стала складываться моя личная тема и книга -  "Сибиряки": 1й макет сделан в 2012-м, 2я версия напечатана оффсетом в Новосибирске в 2013-м (с текстами-подписями в русско-английской билингве, доступна через Блюрб и Амазон - картинки см ниже) 


Now my works from the 'Birthmarks' blog and 'The Siberians' archive are being showcased in our main national gallery – the Tretyakov (‘Metageography’ contemporary art group exhibition showing until February 2016), and a large 'Birthmarks' team show is scheduled for May 2016 in Moscow – its first project appearance in Russia's capital. So, the quiet voice of provincial photo chronicles is becoming audible. What started as a local project has grown into a comprehensive visual archive of Russian rural life as a whole, joining a universal & international ‘territory of humanity’ (though Birthmark speaks only Russian so far)... Now the aim is to spread these chronicles to a wider audience outside Russia and the Russian language. 

***

Сейчас мои работы - из "Родинок" и из архива Сибиряков -  участвуют в выставке современного искусства "Метагеография" на площадке главной галереи страны - Третьяковки; большая командная экспозиция "Родинок" будет в мае 2016го показана в Москве - премьера проекта в российских столицах  . Тихие голоса провинциальных фотохроник становятся слышнее. Локальная инициатива превращается во впечатляющий визуальный архив жизни российской глубинки в целом, универсальную и вненациональную "территорию человечности" (хотя Родинки пока говорят только по-русски)... И цель моя сейчас - поделиться сделанным с широкой аудиторией, выйти за рамки страны и языка. 

My needs and your perks / Что мне нужно и что предлагаю взамен
I need support to cover expenses for design-editing and offset printing of my latest bookThe Siberians: Rurality, with a publication in Spring 2016. On one hand, it summarizes my works in a new re-edited and re-designed unit. On the other hand it is an item within a series to be continued - transmedia stream under 'The Siberians' umbrella (books, multimedia, webdocs, travelling exhibitions). In return for your help, you'll get wide range of perks from our cellar... 
**
Мне нужна ваша поддержка, чтобы покрыть расходы на подготовку (дизайн, верстка) и оффсетный тираж моей новой фотокниги "Сибиряки: Глубинка", со сроком публикации весной 2016. С одной стороны, это подводит итог моей работе, объединяя архив на новом уровне: иной отбор, редизайн. С другой стороны, это часть продолжающейся серии, трансмедийного потока в общем русле "Сибиряков" (книги, мультимедиа, вебдоки, передвижные выставки). Взамен за вашу помощь могу предложить широкий выбор подарков из нашего погребка... 

First ($ 5), you can be mentioned in the ACKNOWLEDGEMENT section of the new book + you get the prior version of 'The Siberians' - e-book_v2 in PDF (early delivery - right after payment* before campaign ends)

Or you can receive:

- 3 SIGNED POSTCARD ($ 10) of some of the images in the book (free delivery, before campaign ends)

- A SIGNED PRINT, 20X30 ($ 20, free shipping) cm OR 30X45 cm ($ 20 + shipping)

- The main reward - NEW BOOK ($ 30 + shipping) v3 - 'The Siberians; Rurality' ultimate re-edited version, 156 pages, photos along with texts (Rus-Eng bi-lingual), Offset Printing, softcover.

- $ 1000 : perks above + A PHOTO EXPEDITION TO WESTERN SIBERIA (your 1-week route within Novosibirsk, Omsk, Tomsk regions or Altay from Biysk to Mongolia border according to your preferences)

***

Прежде всего (5 долларов), вы можете быть упомянуты в разделе благодарностей новой книги + получить книгу версии 2013 в pdf (до окончания кампании, в кратчайшие сроки после оплаты)

Или вы можете получить:

- 3 ПОДПИСАННЫХ АВТОРОМ ОТКРЫТКИ (10 долларов, бесплатная доставка) с фотографиями из книги (бесплатная отправка - до окончания кампании - февраль)

- ПОДПИСАННЫЕ АВТОРОМ ПРИНТЫ 20X30 см (15 долларов, бесплатная доставка) ИЛИ 30X45 cм (20 долларов + доставка) 

- Главный мой встречный подарок - НОВАЯ КНИГА v3 - 'Сибиряки: Глубинка', итоговая версия, 156 страниц, фото и тексты (билингва - русский и английский), оффсет, мягкая обложка - (30 долларов + доставка) 

- 1000 долларов : все вышеперечисленные подарки  + ФОТОЭКСПЕДИЦИЯ В ЗАПАДНУЮ СИБИРЬ (ваше недельное путешествие в компании со мной в качестве гида и помощника по Новосибирской, Омской, Томской областям или Алтаю (от Бийска до Монголии) - в соответствии с вашими предпочтениями **** расходы на ваши билеты и проживание на маршруте не включены)  

And above all, you could become an ANGEL OF THE PROJECT, under whose wings 'Birthmarks on the Map' will keep existing and expanding ($4000 : All of the perks listed above + your name or logo on 'The Siberians: Rurality" cover, to be mentioned at all public presentations and acknowledged on top of BOM blog homepage for one year after the campaign end) 

***

Кроме того, вы можете стать АНГЕЛОМ ПРОЕКТА, под чьим крылом 'Родинки на карте' будут жить и развиваться  (4000 долларов : все перечисленные выше вознаграждения + ваше имя или логотип на обложке новой книги и домашней странице блога, упоминания на всех показах и презентациях) 

Any extra money from The Siberians: Rurality camaign above the goal will help me to develop my projects. 

Деньги, которые кампания "Сибиряки: Глубинка" сможет собрать сверх ожидаемой суммы, поможет мне дальше развивать проект. 

Risks  / Риски 

The images are essentially shot and ready to go (with the exception of some last-minute fortunate snaps I may have the chance to capture) and a reliable designer and publisher are available in my city and ready to work hard... Zero-risk

***

Фотографии в основном сделаны и готовы к началу сборки (хотя отбор может быть дополнен чем-то снятым в последний момент), надежный дизайнер и типография - рядом, в моем городе, готовы к тяжелой работе. Риск=ноль

I chose flexible funding because I don't want to wait up to 30 days for PayPal verification (Indiegogo's reqirement for fixed funding). If I don't achieve the campaign goal of $4000, supporters who invested in the NEW BOOK will be rewarded with a copy made via quality Print-On-Demand format (Blurb) or entirely refunded upon their request. All other project intentions will be fulfilled despite a lesser amount gathered. In case of success of my campaign the only risk for contributors can be a bit slow delivery of 'physical' perks: I'm going to use regular post service to avoid increasing shipping price ;)

***

Я выбрал "гибкое финансирование", потому что не готов был 30 дней ждать верификации PayPal (а этого требует IndieGoGo для "фиксированной схемы"). Если я не достигну финансовой цели кампании в 4000 долларов, инвестировавшие в новую книгу получат ее в штучном исполнении "печать-по-заказу" класса Blurb или по их желанию я полностью верну их деньги.  Все другие мои обязательства перед поддержавшими меня будут выполнены и при меньшей сумме сборов. Единственный риск - небыстрая доставка "физических подарков": для снижения цены доставки будет использована обычная почта  ;)

© Valeriy Klamm 

Tell your friends

I hope you'll share my campaign with your friends - to widen the reach of my project together...

Я очень рассчитываю, что вы расшарите информацию, расскажете о моей кампании вашим друзьям - чтобы расширить наш круг ... 

MORE

My personal website - with a big THE SIBERIANS ARCHIVE >>

NPR - National Public Radio about Birthmark project >>>


FEEDBACK


"'The Siberians' offers a tantalising visual insight into the traditions and culture of people from this fascinating region of the world, beyond many of the stereotypes and clichés often associated with Siberia; "the coldest place on earth" and the place for political exile. It is contrastingly bursting with colour, warmth and friendly familiarity"

Gabriela, UK

".. this album is about a different  Russia – a strange, unknown, a bit sad Russia where people are very much “on the ground” but not denying life - even on the contrary - they all are very vivid and lively, peering towards their life and their future.. Siberian people invest everything in their daily life in order to survive and to create – to create another day, another piece of art, another piece of beauty, another piece of bread. This is a difficult place to live - the daily life there is certainly not easy. But the people there have warm hearts; they can value the very little things they have..."
Nina Dimitrova and Lidia Varbanova - Sofia, Bulgaria / Montreal
" you've showed us another planet, and we like your planet"
visitors of Birthmarks exhibition in Sydney / HeadOn Photo Fest
story_txt:
UPD - JULY 2016: book is done (final title - By The Way), available for print-on-demand via Blurb, perks shipped, project noticed globally - featured on LensCulture 

MYCAMPAIGN
/ МОЯ КАМПАНИЯ 
So my
IndiGoGo campaign ended yesterday – cordial thanks to supporters, who shared
info, and especially to ones who became backers and who invested in my project.
Funds we gathered (though it is less than one fifth part of expected goal) will
allow me to cover expenses of the book design-layout, to print limited series
of book copies (as prototype and rewards), to deliver all perks to backers. We
did a very important step! And results coming soon......
*** 
Итак, вчера завершилась моя кампания на IndieGoGo –
сердечное спасибо всем поддержавшим, и тем, кто делился моей информацией, и, в
особенности, тем, кто стал инвестором проекта, вложив свои деньги. Собранные
средства (хотя это пятая часть ожидавшейся суммы) позволят покрыть расходы на
дизайн и верстку книги, на печать ограниченного тиража книги (прототип и
подарки инвесторам), на доставку всех вознаграждений инвесторам. Мы сделали
важный шаг! Результаты – скоро…. -------------------------------------------------
ФОТОКНИГА "СИБИРЯКИ: ГЛУБИНКА"

There is surface and depth: political madness and daily life apart, hot
news and eternal songs, otherness and kinship. When you are sharing simple human things with someone and feel the commonality behind the differences – there are more chances to understand
than to fight...

***

Есть поверхность и есть глубина: политические безумства - и будни вдали от столиц, горячие новости - и вечные песни, отчужденность и родство. Если ты разделил с кем-то простое-человеческое, почувствовал то общее, что лежит за различиями - более вероятным становится  понимание, не схватка...


Milker Ivan with his nephew. Дояр Иван с племянником © Valeriy Klamm 

I’m Valeriy Klamm, photograher based in
Novosibirsk, Russia. I invite you to dive into the reality of Siberia, to ‘meet’
my neighbours (thousands of miles away, but that's not so far, right?) ... It's cordiality and paradoxes of habitual moments, unpolished details
of existence. It's a gallery of simple heroes in simple circumstances: women and men coming
through ages, shaman and theater director, babushka and pilot, fostered girls and
plumber - their fates beyond faces.  Open this door: my photo book ‘The Siberians’. 
***
Я Валерий Кламм, фотограф из Новосибирска. Приглашаю вас погрузиться в реальность Сибири, познакомиться с моими соседями (тысяча вёрст не крюк ?)) ... Сердечность и парадоксы обыденного, шершавые детали бытия. Простые герои в простых обстоятельствах: мужчины и женщины в их возрастах-времени, шаман и режиссер, бабушка и летчик, приемная дочка и водопроводчик - и судьбы, что стоят за лицами.  Откройте эту дверь: моя фотокнига ‘Сибиряки’. 
About / О проекте

Since late 2009 I’ve run the photoblog community ‘Birthmarks On the Map’ - BOM (in Russian – ‘Rodinki Na Karte’) - devoted to Russian
provinces and focused on inhabitants of little towns and villages. This project, at first supported by local partners, now exists as
my own independent initiative without
resources. Yet it has also grown, having gone 'offline' with group and solo printed shows & multimedia presentations in my region and abroad (Australia, Cambodia, Sweden, Canada, China)... Besides my short intro video above - here is a longer one, a sort of trance ...
***
С конца 2009 года я веду коллективный фотоблог ‘Родинки на карте’ (РНК), посвященный российской провинции, жителям деревень и малых городов. Этот проект, на старте поддержанный местными партнерами, ныне существует как моя частная, независимая инициатива, без опоры на чьи-либо ресурсы. По мере роста и развития, Родинки вышли в оффлайн групповыми и сольными выставками, мультимедиа-показами, в моем регионе и вне России (Австралия, Камбоджа, Швеция, Канада, Китай)... Кроме моего короткого вводного видео - посмотрите вот это, подлиннее, некий транс ... ЗАГОВОР: "хор" фотографов-участников Родинок - и музыкантов 


WATCH  & MEDITATE  -  'INCANTATION' , 'Birthmarks On the Map' clip: 'CHORUS' OF PHOTOGRAPHERS-CONTRIBUTORS (Valeriy Klamm, Alexander Sorin, Ksenia Diodorova, Andrey Kobylko, Fyodor Telkov, Sergey Maximishin, Alexander Kuznetzov, Alexander Stepanenko, Alexander Kustov, Tatyana Plotnikova, Igor Lagunov, Emil Gataullin) AND MUSICIANS (track by Sergey Starostin, Sainkho Namchylak, Molla Silla, Arkadiy Shilkloper, Vladimir Volkov, Pavel Fait) 
I assembled my ‘The Siberians’ book: 1st dummy  in 2012, 2nd version self-published offset in
2013 in Novosibirsk (offset, Rus-Eng bi-lingual texts and captions, available also in pdf via Blurb.com and for in Print-On-Demand on Amazon - see pictures below). 
***
Стала складываться моя личная тема и книга -  "Сибиряки": 1й макет сделан в 2012-м, 2я версия напечатана оффсетом в Новосибирске в 2013-м (с текстами-подписями в русско-английской билингве, доступна через Блюрб и Амазон - картинки см ниже) 





Now my works from the 'Birthmarks' blog and 'The Siberians' archive are being showcased in
our main national gallery – the Tretyakov (‘Metageography’ contemporary art group
exhibition showing until February 2016), and a large 'Birthmarks' team show is scheduled for May 2016 in Moscow – its first project appearance in
Russia's capital. So, the quiet voice of provincial
photo chronicles is becoming audible. What started as a local project has grown
into a comprehensive visual archive of Russian rural life as a whole, joining a universal & international ‘territory of humanity’ (though Birthmark speaks only Russian so far)... Now the aim is to spread these chronicles to a
wider audience outside Russia and the Russian language. 
***
Сейчас мои работы - из "Родинок" и из архива Сибиряков -  участвуют в выставке современного искусства "Метагеография" на площадке главной галереи страны - Третьяковки; большая командная экспозиция "Родинок" будет в мае 2016го показана в Москве - премьера проекта в российских столицах  . Тихие голоса провинциальных фотохроник становятся слышнее. Локальная инициатива превращается во впечатляющий визуальный архив жизни российской глубинки в целом, универсальную и вненациональную "территорию человечности" (хотя Родинки пока говорят только по-русски)... И цель моя сейчас - поделиться сделанным с широкой аудиторией, выйти за рамки страны и языка. 
My needs and your perks / Что мне нужно и что предлагаю взамен
I need support to cover expenses for design-editing and offset printing of my latest bookThe Siberians: Rurality, with a publication in Spring 2016. On one hand, it summarizes my works in a new re-edited and re-designed unit. On the other hand it is an item within a series to be continued - transmedia stream under 'The Siberians' umbrella (books, multimedia, webdocs, travelling exhibitions). In return for your help, you'll get wide
range of perks from our cellar... 
**Мне нужна ваша поддержка, чтобы покрыть расходы на подготовку (дизайн, верстка) и оффсетный тираж моей новой фотокниги "Сибиряки: Глубинка", со сроком публикации весной 2016. С одной стороны, это подводит итог моей работе, объединяя архив на новом уровне: иной отбор, редизайн. С другой стороны, это часть продолжающейся серии, трансмедийного потока в общем русле "Сибиряков" (книги, мультимедиа, вебдоки, передвижные выставки). Взамен за вашу помощь могу предложить широкий выбор подарков из нашего погребка... 
First ($ 5), you can be mentioned in the ACKNOWLEDGEMENT section
of the new book + you get the prior
version of 'The Siberians' - e-book_v2 in PDF (early delivery - right after payment* before campaign ends)
Or you can receive:
- 3 SIGNED POSTCARD ($ 10) of some of the images
in the book (free delivery, before campaign ends)
- A SIGNED PRINT, 20X30 ($ 20, free shipping) cm OR 30X45 cm ($ 20 + shipping)
- The main reward - NEW BOOK ($ 30 + shipping) v3 - 'The Siberians; Rurality' ultimate re-edited version, 156 pages, photos along with texts (Rus-Eng bi-lingual), Offset Printing, softcover.
- $ 1000 : perks above + A PHOTO EXPEDITION TO WESTERN
SIBERIA (your 1-week route within Novosibirsk, Omsk, Tomsk regions or Altay from Biysk to Mongolia border
according to your preferences)
***
Прежде всего (5 долларов), вы можете быть упомянуты в разделе благодарностей новой книги + получить книгу версии 2013 в pdf (до окончания кампании, в кратчайшие сроки после оплаты)
Или вы можете получить:

- 3 ПОДПИСАННЫХ АВТОРОМ ОТКРЫТКИ (10 долларов, бесплатная доставка) с фотографиями из книги (бесплатная отправка - до окончания кампании - февраль)
- ПОДПИСАННЫЕ АВТОРОМ ПРИНТЫ 20X30 см (15 долларов, бесплатная доставка) ИЛИ 30X45 cм (20 долларов + доставка) 
- Главный мой встречный подарок - НОВАЯ КНИГА v3 - 'Сибиряки: Глубинка', итоговая версия, 156 страниц, фото и тексты (билингва - русский и английский), оффсет, мягкая обложка - (30 долларов + доставка) 
- 1000 долларов : все вышеперечисленные подарки  + ФОТОЭКСПЕДИЦИЯ В ЗАПАДНУЮ СИБИРЬ (ваше недельное путешествие в компании со мной в качестве гида и помощника по Новосибирской, Омской, Томской областям или Алтаю (от Бийска до Монголии) - в соответствии с вашими предпочтениями **** расходы на ваши билеты и проживание на маршруте не включены)  



And above all, you could become an ANGEL OF THE
PROJECT, under whose wings 'Birthmarks on the Map' will keep existing and expanding ($4000 : All of the perks listed above + your name or logo on 'The Siberians: Rurality" cover, to be mentioned at all public presentations and acknowledged on top of BOM blog homepage for one year after the campaign end) 
***
Кроме того, вы можете стать АНГЕЛОМ ПРОЕКТА, под чьим крылом 'Родинки на карте' будут жить и развиваться  (4000 долларов : все перечисленные выше вознаграждения + ваше имя или логотип на обложке новой книги и домашней странице блога, упоминания на всех показах и презентациях) 




Any extra money from The
Siberians: Rurality camaign above the goal will help me to develop my projects. 
Деньги, которые кампания "Сибиряки: Глубинка" сможет собрать сверх ожидаемой суммы, поможет мне дальше развивать проект. 

Risks  / Риски 

The images are essentially shot and ready
to go (with the exception of some last-minute fortunate snaps I may have the
chance to capture) and a reliable designer
and publisher are available in my city and ready to work hard... Zero-risk
***
Фотографии в основном сделаны и готовы к началу сборки (хотя отбор может быть дополнен чем-то снятым в последний момент), надежный дизайнер и типография - рядом, в моем городе, готовы к тяжелой работе. Риск=ноль

$4000, supporters
who invested in the NEW BOOK will be rewarded with a copy made via quality Print-On-Demand format (Blurb) or entirely refunded upon their
request. All other project
intentions will be fulfilled
despite a lesser amount gathered. In case of success of my campaign the only risk for contributors can be a bit slow delivery of 'physical' perks: I'm going to use regular post service to avoid increasing shipping price ;)
***
Я выбрал "гибкое финансирование", потому что не готов был 30 дней ждать верификации PayPal (а этого требует IndieGoGo для "фиксированной схемы"). Если я не достигну финансовой цели кампании в 4000 долларов, инвестировавшие в новую книгу получат ее в штучном исполнении "печать-по-заказу" класса Blurb или по их желанию я полностью верну их деньги.  Все другие мои обязательства перед поддержавшими меня будут выполнены и при меньшей сумме сборов. story:
Hello!

Meet the Team:

  Photographer - Tim "Naughty" Reardon

Photographer - Ashlea "Nice" Reardon  

 Resident Tech Guru - Sean "Techie" Reardon


We are Naughty & Nice Photography

Three siblings working toward the same goal - to own our own photography studio. But not just any ol' photography studio. Though we will continue to do traditional photography - family, couples, baby and senior photos - we would love to pursue our creative spirit through adding custom Cosplay shoots. It's where our hearts lie and as the video above demonstrates, there are a lot of people who feel the same way.

 What will make us unique is our approach to Cosplay shoots. If you don't already have your super, awesome Cosplay costumes on hand and ready to be photographed in, then this is -

How it will Work:

~ Dream It ~

Do you have an idea for an awesome Cosplay, Renaissance Faire or Re-enactment costume? Or maybe you are a huge fan of a certain period in world history. Bring your idea to us. We can work together to create exactly what your imagination has cooked up.

~ Be It ~

Take your dream from imagination to reality. To that end we have contracted with a  dear friend who just happens to be a very talented and experienced seamstress. Her new company, Threads Through Time, will work with us FREE of charge to create your one of a kind costume for a photo shoot. We are also looking at bringing in someone to do hair/beauty makeup and possibly even someone for special FX makeup to give our clients a ONE OF A KIND photo shoot experience.

~ Photograph It ~

Once your final fittings have been accomplished, then we get to have fun. A photo shoot where you and your costume are the stars! It will be a fun filled afternoon of photography with the various poses and locations our team have cooked up for your specific shoot.


Our seamstress' company, Threads Through Time created the cloak featured in one of our shoots. (Above) And part of the costuming (cloak, pants, leg wraps) in our shoot of the Ranger. (Below) 

But what will happen to all of those glorious one of a kind costumes at the end of the photo session?

Don't worry, we've got that covered too! 

There are three options.

1) From the outset, the client will decide if they want their costume custom created just for them with our purchase option. The purchase of the costume would mean that the costume will be created specifically for their measurements and in exactly the materials/colors they wish used. The purchase of the final product directly from us will cost less than if they bought it at the retail price.

 If they choose not to purchase the costume, then one of the following will happen.

2) The costume may enter into our inventory. - We will guarantee that the costume will not be shot in the same way that it was used in the client's shoot, but we will reserve the right to use it in other ways.

3) The costume may be sold for the retail price via the Threads Through Time Etsy store front.

We have big plans for our business.

 One of our major projects is an annual Cosplay or Artistic photography calendar. The best shoots from the year may just make the cut!

Help us take our business to the next level.

We can only do so with the support of fellow dreamers like you!


What We Need:

  • First and foremost - two more cameras. We have one that we have been sharing between us. Thank goodness our parents taught us to share.
  • Backdrops and support system. As much as we love using the great outdoors as our backdrops, a cold Upstate New York winter makes it uncomfortable and unpleasant for the models, not to mention our fingers! Besides, versatility is key.
  • Various small equipment purchases like light bounces, light meters, sandbags for backdrops and lighting rigs.
  • A budget for our wonderful seamstress which will allow us to build our costuming inventory. 
  • Paying for a year of Adobe Photoshop/Lightbox.
  • Props. Who doesn't love working with props?
  • Marketing - fliers, advertising, car magnets, t-shirts for the team. Website Maintenance for two years.
  • A new PC and external hard-drive strictly for the business.

If we are unable to reach our full goal, then we will start at the top of the list and work our way down paying for what we can and putting off the purchase of the rest until later.

What You Get

Satisfaction that you helped three young people go after their dreams and achieve them. If that's not enough, then how about all of the fabulous Perks we've lined up for you?


The Impact

If a picture is worth a thousand words, then there are not enough words in the world to express how much your contribution would mean to us. With every dollar pledged, we are one step closer to being able to let our creativity loose. What we can create will only be limited by our own imaginations.

And you will have a direct hand in the realization of our dream.

The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do. ~ Sarah Ban Breathnach

Risks & Challenges

Like any new endeavor there is excitement, risks and challenges. Nothing is ever simple. Nothing is ever risk free. We have lived and traveled all over the world. No matter where we've gone, there has been one thing that has been there to see us through. We have each other.  We know each other's weaknesses and strengths. If one of us has trouble dealing with a situation, you can guarantee that one or the other of us will pick up the slack and keep the momentum moving forward. Besides, there is no substitute for hard work and a can-do attitude.

Other Ways You Can Help:

Share. Share. And most of all SHARE our campaign with others. Use the Indiegogo share tools to make it easy on yourself!

We can't do this alone!


Youtube video info:

Published on Nov 5, 2014

D-Piddy
https://www.facebook.com/deadpool.vs
https://twitter.com/_dpiddy

Vocals: Charmie Sweets
https://www.youtube.com/user/xxsarach...
https://www.facebook.com/CharmieSweets

Camera: Chilly Willy & D-Piddy
https://www.youtube.com/ChillyWillyTube

Music: Felix Voon

Subscribe to his channel!
story_txt:
Hello!
Meet the Team:

  Photographer - Tim "Naughty" Reardon

Photographer - Ashlea "Nice" Reardon  

 Resident Tech Guru - Sean "Techie" Reardon


We are Naughty & Nice Photography

Three siblings working toward the same goal - to own our own photography studio. But not just any ol' photography studio. Though we will continue to do traditional photography - family, couples, baby and senior photos - we would love to pursue our creative spirit through adding custom Cosplay shoots. It's where our hearts lie and as the video above demonstrates, there are a lot of people who feel the same way.
 What will make us unique is our approach to Cosplay shoots. If you don't already have your super, awesome Cosplay costumes on hand and ready to be photographed in, then this is -

How it will Work:
~ Dream It ~
Do you have an idea for an awesome Cosplay, Renaissance Faire or Re-enactment costume? Or maybe you are a huge fan of a certain period in world history. Bring your idea to us. We can work together to create exactly what your imagination has cooked up.
~ Be It ~
Take your dream from imagination to reality. To that end we have contracted with a  dear friend who just happens to be a very talented and experienced seamstress. Her new company, Threads Through Time, will work with us FREE of charge to create your one of a kind costume for a photo shoot. We are also looking at bringing in someone to do hair/beauty makeup and possibly even someone for special FX makeup to give our clients a ONE OF A KIND photo shoot experience.
~ Photograph It ~
Once your final fittings have been accomplished, then we get to have fun. A photo shoot where you and your costume are the stars! It will be a fun filled afternoon of photography with the various poses and locations our team have cooked up for your specific shoot.

Our seamstress' company, Threads Through Time created the cloak featured in one of our shoots. (Above) And part of the costuming (cloak, pants, leg wraps) in our shoot of the Ranger. (Below) 

But what will happen to all of those glorious one of a kind costumes at the end of the photo session?
Don't worry, we've got that covered too! 
There are three options.
1) From the outset, the client will decide if they want their costume custom created just for them with our purchase option. The purchase of the costume would mean that the costume will be created specifically for their measurements and in exactly the materials/colors they wish used. The purchase of the final product directly from us will cost less than if they bought it at the retail price.
 If they choose not to purchase the costume, then one of the following will happen.
2) The costume may enter into our inventory. - We will guarantee that the costume will not be shot in the same way that it was used in the client's shoot, but we will reserve the right to use it in other ways.
3) The costume may be sold for the retail price via the Threads Through Time Etsy store front.
We have big plans for our business.
 One of our major projects is an annual Cosplay or Artistic photography calendar. The best shoots from the year may just make the cut!
Help us take our business to the next level.
We can only do so with the support of fellow dreamers like you!

What We Need:


First and foremost - two more cameras. We have one that we have been sharing between us. Thank goodness our parents taught us to share.
Backdrops and support system. As much as we love using the great outdoors as our backdrops, a cold Upstate New York winter makes it uncomfortable and unpleasant for the models, not to mention our fingers! Besides, versatility is key.

Various small equipment purchases like light bounces, light meters, sandbags for backdrops and lighting rigs.
A budget for our wonderful seamstress which will allow us to build our costuming inventory. 
Paying for a year of Adobe Photoshop/Lightbox. Props. Who doesn't love working with props?
Marketing - fliers, advertising, car magnets, t-shirts for the team. Website Maintenance for two years.

A new PC and external hard-drive strictly for the business.
   If we are unable to reach our full goal, then we will start at the top of the list and work our way down paying for what we can and putting off the purchase of the rest until later.

What You Get
Satisfaction that you helped three young people go after their dreams and achieve them. If that's not enough, then how about all of the fabulous Perks we've lined up for you?







The Impact If a picture is worth a thousand words, then there are not enough words in the world to express how much your contribution would mean to us. With every dollar pledged, we are one step closer to being able to let our creativity loose. What we can create will only be limited by our own imaginations.
And you will have a direct hand in the realization of our dream.

The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do. ~ Sarah Ban Breathnach
Risks & Challenges

Like any new endeavor there is excitement, risks and challenges. Nothing is ever simple. Nothing is ever risk free. We have lived and traveled all over the world. No matter where we've gone, there has been one thing that has been there to see us through. We have each other.  We know each other's weaknesses and strengths. If one of us has trouble dealing with a situation, you can guarantee that one or the other of us will pick up the slack and keep the momentum moving forward. Besides, there is no substitute for hard work and a can-do attitude.


    Other Ways You Can Help: Share. Share. And most of all SHARE our campaign with others. Use the Indiegogo share tools to make it easy on yourself!
We can't do this alone!

Youtube video info:

Published on Nov 5, 2014
D-Piddyhttps://www.facebook.com/deadpool.vshttps://twitter.com/_dpiddyVocals: Charmie Sweetshttps://www.youtube.com/user/xxsarach...https://www.facebook.com/CharmieSweetsCamera: Chilly Willy & D-Piddyhttps://www.youtube.com/ChillyWillyTubeMusic: Felix VoonSubscribe to his channel!

story: I will recast women like Sojourner Truth, Madame CJ Walker, Barbara Jordan and 9 more women to be modern day royalty. This project will be funded to hire models, pay for locations and props to showcase these queens in a marvelous light.

story:
About the Artist and Project.

I have been a photographer and artist for over 10 years now and have loved sharing my vision with everyone. I love to blend every form of art and imagination into a unique style that draws attention and conversation. With a background in graphic design, I am able to blend different forms of art and everyday inspiration into my own vision. From sets to styling and makeup, I take on all aspects of making my art a reality. I put in as much of myself as possible into every portrait I create. As a freelance artist, I invest every extra cent into my art an photography. 

Each photo goes through months of conceptualizing, prop selection, and searching  for the perfect personality and model to tell my story. I try to use as little digital manipulation as possible, but still create a surrealistic world for a perfect balance of old and new. I work tirelessly to collaborate with talent from all walks of life come up with the most original work  I can dream up. My work is inspired from normal everyday behavior, pop culture, technology, age, self-image, and sexuality. The characters introduce through work live in a very animated, colorful, and vibrant world. 

So, why a campaign? Over the past few years, I have self-funded all my own projects and gallery shows. I’ve bought all my own equipment, sets, and anything that was needed to make my vision a reality. However, self-funding has limited my ability to spread my work beyond the limited Chicago niche market I have created. My campaign aims to bring art and fashion into countless hands and make it accessible to everyone. 

All of the Nestor’s Photography T-shirt designs are made to be all inclusive and not limited to gender or body size. I have done all the leg work in terms of design and testing dozens of samples. Now, I need your help to make these products of art work come to life for everyone to enjoy. 

With your help, Nestor’s Photography will be able to produce all of these amazing products and get them in the homes and on the bodies of every art and fashion lover possible. At the moment, all of the designs and books are limited to one time printing or special orders. With your contributions and support, Nestor’s Photography will be able to make a full size run of all shirt deigns and photography books. 

I am now at the stage were I am ready to push this brand, book, and shirt line on a national scale. I will debut my product collection to the public during this year’s RuPaul’s Drag Con at the Los Angeles Convention Center on May 7 & 8th.


Funding & Perks! 

The majority of the funding and support will used for actual printing and to produce enough product to actually make an impact on the market and consumers. It is very important for me to make art accessible and wearable for everyone at any age, sex or size. Without the funding, producing large printing runs of the book and shirt line will be limited to little or none. All of the perks/products are exclusive to this campaign and not available anywhere else. Contributors will have first dibs on receiving this collection and book (unless attending Drag Con) .

C'mon Amazing Perks!!!

  • Exclusive oversized post card designs. 
  • Vivid oversized buttons.
  • Limited Ed.  8x 10 & 11 x 14 prints.
  • 1 page calendars.
  • 12 Month Full Color Calendar.
  • Eco-friendly tote bag. 
  • Nestor's Photography Neon inked tee and tank line.
  • Nestor's Photography Designer full print tee and tank line.
  • Nestor's Photography hardcover 20 page book.
  • Nestor's Photography photo shoot experience. 

Tanks 

 1). Out of the Woods- Jason   2).  Mike    3). Scream     4).  Sky Wife      5). R.I.P Jolene
5). Lick it    7).  Space Jam    8).  Cielo    9). Mommy's Baby Boy     10).  Crying game
11). Dreamland   12).  Compadre    13).  Luchador   14) Cheetah Daddy    15). Chorizo. 


Inked Tee Line

1). Space Jam   2).  You tried it    3). Famous     4).  Mommy's Baby Boy      5). Lick it 

5).Cielo    7). Compadre 

Nestor's Playhouse Hardcover Book 


Featuring _ Pearl, Gia Gunn, Puterbaugh Sisters, Aurora Sexton, Valentine Addams, Shea Couleé, Lila Star, Robert Suarez, and many more ! 


Exclusive Button & Postcard Collection



Limited Edition Indiegogo Prints 

REPLACE REPLCE

Prints
1).Housewife 2).      Kawaii Boy       3). Cielo         4) Judy Goes Over the Rainbow         5). but first let me take a selfie          6). Dreamland                7). R.I.P Jolene                             8) It's a Scream                           9) Mike                                   10). Mommy's Baby Boy


The Impact

Your contributions will help fund years of hard work, dedication and art! Nestor's Photography offers a very unique view of the world around us. It's made up of so many different personalities, backgrounds, beauty, bodies and lifestyles that is normally not seen by mainstream culture. Nestor has always locally produced all of his goods either hand made or locally sourced. The Designer full print tanks and tee line are made in America.The Neon inked tee line is produced locally in Chicago and both of the lines are accented with one of a kind Neon hand painting by Nestor himself. 



Credits & Clients 

RuPaul's Drag Race Photo Gallery


Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk and challenge is not achieving this goal. Funding is critical to make this project come to life. All of the hard work has been done with testing samples materials, printer's and processing. The book and shirt line have been a culmination of 5 years of portrait series and solo work. It is crucial to achieve the funding goal to actually produce a decent run of all 15 designs along with 10-20 physical books to shop around to collectors and galleries. 
 Nestor's photography has amassed a reputation of quality, style and excellence. He is extremely dedication to his passion of story telling and photography. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not donate please share the campaign send it to friends, lovers and fashionistas. There is something in the collection to  surely put a smile on anyone.

  • Copy the link 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Like so many immigrants, I have a ton of jobs and things that I do for work. I'm lucky that the things I do are things that I love! In a nutshell, I'm:

  • A photographer
  • A game designer
  • A suicide prevention expert
  • A dad

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign is to take my work to the next level. The funds raised will act as a pre-sale (at a great discount!) for my busy photography season, a way to build suicide prevention programs that I'm working on and a way to fund my next game.

Tons of perks! Portrait sessions, weddings, commercial photography, family photos and introducing a new custom roll of film shot with you in mind! On top of that, access to my games, a chance to be an early funder of a new suicide prevention program and more!

If I don't reach the entire goal, the funds still go to building the programs and supporting my work!

The Impact

After trying to choose a single, traditional career, I’ve realized that my strength lies in my diverse interests. I’m a photographer, but I love mental health community building. I’m a suicide prevention expert, but I’m also a theater and gaming nerd eager to tell stories. 

Combining my passions in unusual ways makes all of my work better.

If we’ve worked together before, this is a chance for you to grab a great discount on a future collaboration. I can’t wait to see you again.

If you’ve been curious about what I do, this is your opportunity to learn how my varied skills can help you tell the stories you yearn to tell.

The three big projects are:

Gandin Le Photo studio - I've built a new home studio and I want to use it to make my work accessible, open to everyone and sustainable.

Gaming and Suicide Prevention program - (click here for more info)  - I'm launching an ongoing drop-in role playing game session for people in suicidal crisis. I've partnered with a crisis center who will be available if anyone needs crisis support, but the game itself is there to provide community, something to look forward to and a safe (well, unless you're a Beholder) place to be. 

Playable Memoir - a new way to tell stories. - My games are all memoir games, and I'm taking on clients who want to tell their story through a game. It's a way to take a moment in someone's life and inviting other people in to experience that moment through a game. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with people who need a dynamite photographer at a great discount, or who love gaming, community building, and mental health.

story:
Short Summary

Imagine what it is like growing up as a woman in today’s society, where the media demands perfection, and where body-shaming has become all too prevalent. Too fat? Too thin? Too short? It is a constant struggle to maintain the concept of ‘beauty’.

In this book the Salty Girls challenge this norm, and strive to put an end to body shaming. NO MORE feeling embarrassed or ashamed of their bodies, The Salty Girls have now inspired other women with CF, from literally all around the world. They embrace their body’s scars and all, to inspire women everywhere to do the same. These women truly are the epitome of remarkable strength, enormous resilience, and unique beauty both inside and out. Not only is this book about raising awareness for Cystic Fibrosis, but it can truly reach all females who have ever felt this way.

Salty Girls is the logical evolution of my first book, Just Breathe, which focused on portraits of adults with Cystic Fibrosis. Around the same time I saw the photo of model Bethany Townsend, who suffers from Crohn’s disease, and another model with the skin disease vitiligo being interviewed by Tyra Banks. I thought it’s time for a model with CF. I know what these woman go through on a daily basis; everyday is a struggle living with CF. And, to the uninformed, it’s an invisible fatal disease. With this book it’s invisible no more.


The stories here are real and powerful. It’s the Salty Girls, in their own words. 77 women in total participated in the ground-breaking project.




What We Need & What You Get

The book is done and will be at the printers shortly. We are now offering these special deals to get both the BOOK and the SaltyGirls tank top , AS WELL as a hires PDF version of the book. The $5,000 we are trying to raise will get us over the goal line faster.



The Impact

Cystic Fibrosis Explained
Cystic fibrosis is a life-threatening disorder that causes severe damage to the lungs and digestive system. An inherited condition, CF affects the cells that produce mucus, sweat and digestive juices. These secreted fluids are normally thin and slippery. But in cystic fibrosis, a defective gene causes the secretions to become thick and sticky. Instead of acting as a lubricant, the secretions plug up tubes, ducts and passageways, especially in the lungs and pancreas.


Risks & Challenges

The book is DONE. After a year in the works we are almost ready to ship. There is almost ZERO risk, as we'll be going to print any day now. Delivery will be 100% guaranteed.



.

story:
Short Summary

Due to some circumstances of life my world turned upside down almost three years ago, and since then I have been working like crazy to develop my own business, loads of work with no profit at all, and I gradually became a zombie as a result of the everyday struggle to make ends meet, until I eventually found out I was born to do sth else. 

As soon as I realized how important is to pursue the passion, and redefined success as making a living with a job you love.  I really miss the creative and happy person I used to be. My old friend Pentax served me well as we travelled together in good old times, but since then I grew up, and he just got obsolete, and finally started to fail me. Well, it’s never been a professional camera, but I think I used it to the best of its ability. In perfect conditions I got good shots and learned a lot. But in difficult conditions there is no way to take sharp photos with it, and unfortunately, not everything can be fixed with Photoshop.

I am craving for a change in my life, so I applied for an EU subvention for new businesses and failed once again due to some formal issues I can do nothing about, which is really frustrating. Lottery didn't  work (somebody else got those 38 million zloty), and Santa won’t bring me any new DSLR either, no matter how well I behave. I could also be saving money for the rest of my life and I am, but it will take an eternity.

I have been dreaming about becoming a photographer all my life and now I have some ideas of how to make a living with it, as well as some skills, but the beginning is the toughest.  My aim is to preserve the beauty of nature and immortalize people’s memories. Recently I have been obsessed with time lapse photography, capturing the flow of time. But this kind of artistic creation requires a camera which is far more technologically advanced.



What I Need

Here is a list of some basic gear for a professional photographer. As you can see, the equipment is incredibly expensive, no way I can afford it in ten years:


Canon Speedlite 600EX-RT

$400

Lens Canon EF-S f/3.5-5.6 IS STM

$300

Lens Canon EF-S 10-22mm f/3.5-4.5 USM

$550

Canon EOS 5d Mark III - body

$2500

Lens EF 70-200 mm f/2.8 IS II USM

$1700


Body and a lens would be already something to begin with. I already have access to a good computer with original Adobe CS6, so I’m focusing on the gear itself.

5000 USD is not a must. I'll be extremely happy with half of it, so I can invest in a camera body. If I don't reach the goal, I will go buying things one by one with savings, but it will take an eternity. 



What you get - perks!

Well, as a photographer, apart from my lifelong gratitude and boosting your positive karma, I can offer you what I love most and what I do best. Feel free to pick any shot from my Gallery (see tabs) and you will receive it in the highest resolution I have (private license). You can print it out, use for your private blog or website, or any project of yours.

Risks & Challenges

Well, the only risk I can think of is me sacrificing a kidney as a last resort. No, just kidding. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Any help, no matter how small, would be greatly appreciated. If you cannot contribute with money, please share my wish with your friends on Facebook or whatever social service you use! An email would be just as fine.

XOXO
story_txt:
Short Summary 
Due to some
circumstances of life my world turned upside down almost three years ago, and
since then I have been working like crazy to develop my own business, loads of
work with no profit at all, and I gradually became a zombie as a result of the
everyday struggle to make ends meet, until I eventually found out I was born to do sth else. 
As soon as I
realized how important is to pursue the passion, and redefined success as
making a living with a job you love.  I really miss the creative and happy person I used to be. My old friend Pentax
served me well as we travelled together in good old times, but since then I grew up, and he just got obsolete, and finally started to fail me. Well, it’s never been a professional camera, but I think I used it to the best of its ability. In perfect conditions I got good shots and learned a lot. But in difficult conditions there is no way to take sharp photos with it, and unfortunately, not everything can be fixed with Photoshop.
I am craving for a change in my life, so I applied for an EU subvention for new
businesses and failed once again due to some formal issues I can do nothing
about, which is really frustrating. Lottery didn't  work (somebody else got those 38 million zloty), and Santa won’t bring me any new DSLR either, no matter how well I behave. I could also be saving money for the rest of my life and I am, but it will take an eternity.I have been dreaming about becoming a photographer all my life and now I have some ideas of how to make a living with it, as well as some skills, but the beginning is the toughest.  My aim is to preserve
the beauty of nature and immortalize people’s memories. Recently I have been obsessed with time lapse
photography, capturing the flow of time. But this kind of
artistic creation requires a camera which is far more technologically advanced.


  What I Need 
Here is a list of some basic gear for a professional photographer. As you can
see, the equipment is incredibly expensive, no way I can afford it in ten years:





Canon Speedlite 600EX-RT


$400




Lens Canon EF-S
  f/3.5-5.6 IS STM


$300




Lens Canon EF-S
  10-22mm f/3.5-4.5 USM


$550




Canon EOS 5d
  Mark III - body


$2500




Lens EF 70-200
  mm f/2.8 IS II USM


$1700





Body and a
lens would be already something to begin with. I already have access to a good
computer with original Adobe CS6, so I’m focusing on the gear itself.
5000 USD is not a must. I'll be extremely happy with half of it, so I can invest in a camera body. If I don't reach the goal, I will go buying things one by one with savings, but it will take an eternity. 



   What you get - perks!
Well, as a photographer, apart from my lifelong gratitude and boosting your positive karma, I can offer you what I love most and what I do best. Feel free to pick any shot from my Gallery (see tabs) and you will receive it in the highest resolution I have (private license). You can print it out, use for your private blog or website, or any project of yours.
    Risks & Challenges Well, the only risk I can think of is me sacrificing a kidney as a last resort. No, just kidding. 

    Other Ways You Can Help 
Any
help, no matter how small, would be greatly appreciated. If you cannot contribute with money, please share my wish with your friends on Facebook or whatever social service you use! An email would be just as fine.XOXO

story:
Who is FotoKonbit?

FotoKonbit is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization that teaches photography in Haiti and its diaspora.  We were founded in 2010 by a group of Haitian and American photographers and educators.  We have worked with more than one hundred students, both adults and children, throughout Haiti, and now in New York, which is home to one of the largest Haitian diaspora communities in the United States.

What is this project about?

FotoKonbit aims to create a photographic dialogue between a group of Haitian teenagers in Brooklyn and a group of teenagers from the Zoranje community of Port-au-Prince. We are already working with these two different groups of young photographers but the funds that we are asking for through this campaign will allow us to produce two intensive seven day photography workshops with both groups. During these two workshops (one in Haiti, one in Brooklyn) the students will be able to ask each other questions and see as well as comment on each others photographs online.

Where will the funds go?

The money we raise will go to production costs for the two workshops:  one in Brooklyn, and the other in Haiti.  We will need four cameras, eight memory cards, two hard drives as well as transportation and meals for our students and teachers.

What perks are available?

$25 Postcard. One of our students will write you a thank you postcard!

$50 A 5x7 print. We will send you a 5x7 signed FotoKonbit archival print and a thank you postcard written by a FotoKonbit student. The print will be from either the Brooklyn or the Port-au-Prince workshop.

$100 An 8x10 print. We will send you an 8x10 signed FotoKonbit archival print and a thank you postcard written by a FotoKonbit student. The image will be from either the Brooklyn or the Port-au-Prince workshop.

$250 A 16x20 print. We will send you a signed  16x20 FotoKonbit archival print.  The image will be from either the Brooklyn or the Port-au-Prince workshop.

$500 Two 16x20 prints Two 16x20 signed FotoKonbit archival prints. The images will be from either the Brooklyn or the Port-au-Prince workshop.

$1,000 Prints and a video! Two large archival prints from either the Brooklyn or Port-au-Prince workshop or from the FotoKonbit archive. (The sizes of the prints will depend upon the images selected.)

We will also send you a personalized thank you video from FotoKonbit students.

Find us on the web!

www.fotokonbit.org

www.instagram.com/fotokonbit

www.twitter.com/fotokonbit

www.facebook.com/fotokonbit

Our community partners: 

The Haitian American Community Coalition (HCC) - Brooklyn, New York

www.hccinc.org

Founded in 1982, the Haitian-American Community Coalition (HCC) is a registered 501(c) 3 nonprofit community-based service provider (and originally a network coordinator of eight Haitian community centers in the New York Metropolitan Area that help U.S. Haitian immigrants gain self-sufficiency). HCC services clients through immigration/refuge assistance, ESL, housing placement assistance, health and wellness education (via Fitness for Flatbush and FitBK), PLWHA housing, HIV/AIDS education prevention, case management, mental health services, substance abuse counseling, and youth services. Services are provided in English, French, Haitian Creole, and Spanish. A 32-year service history has established HCC as a spokes organization and information source on Haitian communities in the U.S. and Haiti for Federal, State and City agencies, hospitals, universities, public schools, and research groups.

PRODEV - Haiti

www.prodevhaiti.org

PRODEV is a Haitian-led non-profit, non-political foundation officially recognized by the government of Haiti.  Founded on the idea that edikayson se sel soliyson, “education is the only solution” in Haiti, PRODEV’s work has expanded over time to address the evolving needs of Haiti’s children. PRODEV's vision is a Haiti where all citizens have access to education and are empowered to take an active role in building a just and democratic society.  PRODEV's mission is to develop, manage and support schools and centers in underserved communities. Our network is committed to accessibility, excellence and civic participation. We advocate locally and internationally to promote the idea that only education can create a stronger Haiti.

story:
Why this project is needed:

I'm Vanessa Perkins and I'm a professional Boudoir Photographer! I'm happily married with a beautiful daughter and twins on the way!

Throughout my photography career, I've had the privilege of seeing many women build their confidence and see how beautiful they are inside and out through their boudoir photoshoot experiences. 

After moving to a new town in California, there are no shared photo studios that we can rent time slots from (like I have been doing my whole career) which is what leads us to our campaign!

Opening A New Space:

With your help we can reach our goal of $18,000, which will enable us to open our own photography studio! Here's what we plan on doing:

  • Renting out our own space to turn into our phot studio!
  • Renovating
  • Furnishing
  • Decorating
  • Securing the space as safe environment

Of course we hope to achieve our ultimate goal of $18,000, but if we are under our goal, we will use what funds we do achieve to first begin renting the space. From there, we will add on to the space as the funds come. Even small donations can go a long way!

Why now?

We are currently in communication with and booking our 2021 women, who are looking to find an experience that will lift them and bring them the self love that they deserve! 

Even during the pandemic this last year, we have been booking spots and seeing an influx of women come in for their shoots. We already have the demand, spaces have begun filling up! All we need now is the space.

As a thank you for your donation:

With your contributions, some perks we want to give are discounts off your own family, couples and boudoir shoots! Some educational videos about camera basics and posing. All photoshoots can be scheduled February-December 2021.

Thank you so much for your time and donations!
